summary:
Santana is an American rock band started in 1966 by guitarist Carlos Santana. They became famous after playing at the Woodstock Festival in 1969. The band's early albums, like *Santana* (1969) and *Abraxas* (1970), were big hits with songs like "Black Magic Woman" and "Oye Como Va."

In the 1970s, Santana tried new sounds with jazz fusion. After a break, they came back strong in 1999 with the album *Supernatural*, which had huge hits like "Smooth." Santana has sold over 100 million albums worldwide and won many awards, including 8 Grammys in one night.
title: Santana (band)
